name: image-parse-chevereto
description: A short description of your package

cheveretoUploadOn.title: Chevereto Upload On
cheveretoUploadOn.description: If checked, parse a image into md file will start upload process.

cheveretoUploadOnloadSwitch.title: Chevereto Upload Onload Switch
cheveretoUploadOnloadSwitch.description: If checked, local images used in md file will start to upload when md file loaded. (Requries: 'Chevereto Upload On' On)

cheveretoApiKey.title: Chevereto Api Key
cheveretoApiKey.description: Input your api key, you can find it in your dashboard, default is my key ,Do not mark sure always available.

localImageSave.title: Local Image Save
localImageSave.description: If checked, the images will alse be saved in a subfolder when you parse a image into md file, otherwise, image will be saved in subfolder .tmp and will be remove after upload.

localSubfolderName.title: Local Subfolder Name
localSubfolderName.description: Subfolder name for images, set to empty will use the same name of your md file, eg: md file name xxxx.md, subfolder name xxxx.

localImageAutoremove.title: Local Image Autoremove
localImageAutoremove.description: If checked, images in subfolder (set in 'Local Subfolder Name') will be removed automaticlly after upload. Notes that images not in subfolder will not be moved in any case
